description: The leading AI therapy platform. Here for life's challenges with empathy & understanding. Online and free trial. Our AI therapists do parts work (IFS), mindset (CBT), and non-dual spiritual work
title: AI Therapy by Heartfelt Services
introduction: Heartfelt Services provides AI therapeutic services with a spiritual grounding, aiming to help users navigate life's challenges with compassion and understanding.

faqs.question: How do I choose an AI therapist?
faqs.answer: Any way you like. You can always meet another one. Use your intuition, or find the approach you find most attractive.

faqs.question: What can I talk about?
faqs.answer: Anything that's on your mind. Seemingly big or small. All is welcome.

faqs.question: What about my privacy?
faqs.answer: Your privacy is our utmost priority. All your data is encrypted and stored securely.
